Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This investment is not just about acquiring a tool; it's about unlocking new possibilities and enhancing your operations significantly. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your business to the next level. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
